article_title: UnitedHealth (UNH) Stock Gains as Healthcare Sector Recovers Earlier Losses
article_text: You need to LOG IN to edit your watchlist.

article_metadata.description: UnitedHealth (UNH) stock is increasing in mid-afternoon trading on Friday, after the healthcare company said it was considering dropping out of the Affordable Care Act.
article_metadata.author: Amanda Albright
